BLL

Class WorkerRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • BLL.WorkerRegister

  • public class WorkerRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    Register for all worker type classes e.g. Staff, Contractor, etc. This is a singleton class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkerRegister() 

    • Method Summary

      Checks user credentials for validation
      java.util.ArrayList<Worker> findByName(WorkerRoles role, WorkerType workType, java.lang.String name)
      Finds Workers by role, worker type and name

      • WorkerRegister

        public WorkerRegister()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WorkerRegister getInstance()
        Return a unique class ref (Singleton)
        Returns:
        Singleton reference to WorkerRegister

      • addWorker

        public Worker addWorker(WorkerRoles role,
               java.lang.String[] name,
               java.lang.String userName,
               java.lang.String password,
               WorkerType type)
        Adds Worker objects to the Worker Register N.B. will not replace an instance of a worker object with the same username remove the instance and then add it to re-use the username.
        Parameters:
        role - The work role of the new worker
        name - The name of the worker
        userName - The user name for the worker to login
        password - The password for the worker
        type - The type of worker (valid values are as WorkerType enumeration)
        Returns:
        The new Worker class if created or null if not

      • removeWorker

        public boolean removeWorker(Worker worker)
        Removes Worker object from the register
        Parameters:
        worker - object to be removed
        Returns:
        Confirmation that the object has been found and removed

      • checkPassword

        public Worker checkPassword(java.lang.String userName,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Checks user credentials for validation
        Parameters:
        userName - Username
        password - Password
        Returns:
        Worker object that match the credentials if found

      • findByRole

        public java.util.ArrayList<Worker> findByRole(WorkerRoles role,
                                     WorkerType workType)
        Finds workers by role and worker type
        Parameters:
        role - a worker role what is required e.g. QC
        workType - a worker type e.g. Staff, Sub-contractor OR null for all
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Worker objects that match the search

      • findByName

        public java.util.ArrayList<Worker> findByName(WorkerRoles role,
                                     WorkerType workType,
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Finds Workers by role, worker type and name
        Parameters:
        role - a worker role what is required e.g. QC
        workType - a worker type e.g. Staff, Sub-contractor OR null for all
        name - The name of the worker (Case insensitive & matches parts of name e.g. JAM = James)
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Worker objects that match the search
